docs.snippet: Manchester United are trailing Manchester City this season on the pitch but are peerless when it comes to their social media muscle, according to a report published this week.

headline.print_headline: Manchester United Still Flex Most Social Media Muscle
headline.main: Manchester United Still Flex Most Social Media Muscle

docs.snippet: Fund managers have begun to ditch so-called FANG stocks that powered the U.S. stock market to record highs in January and are slowly rotating into commodity-related shares and other value stocks which typically outperform in late-cycle recoveries....

headline.print_headline: FANG Stocks' Bite Has U.S. Fund Managers Looking for Alternatives
headline.main: FANG Stocks' Bite Has U.S. Fund Managers Looking for Alternatives

docs.snippet: A video of an infant smoking a small cigar set off outrage on social media that helped North Carolina authorities identify and arrest the mother.

headline.print_headline: Police: Mom Arrested After Video of Smoking Baby Goes Viral
headline.main: Police: Mom Arrested After Video of Smoking Baby Goes Viral

docs.snippet: U.S. stocks dropped on Monday, with the S&P and Nasdaq suffering their worst day in just over five weeks, as concerns over increased regulation for large tech companies was spearheaded by a plunge in Facebook shares.

headline.print_headline: Wall Street Drops as Regulation Worry Sinks Tech Shares
headline.main: Wall Street Drops as Regulation Worry Sinks Tech Shares

docs.snippet: Some websites are falsely claiming that NASA has "confessed" to "dosing Americans" with lithium and other chemicals.

headline.print_headline: False Stories Claim NASA 'Confessed' to Spreading Lithium
headline.main: False Stories Claim NASA 'Confessed' to Spreading Lithium

docs.snippet: Microsoft Corp. says it's making a major purchase of solar energy in Virginia.

headline.print_headline: Microsoft Announces Major Solar Buy in Virginia
headline.main: Microsoft Announces Major Solar Buy in Virginia

docs.snippet: The European Commission will propose rules on Wednesday designed to make digital companies pay their fair share of tax and set to hit U.S. tech giants such as Google and Facebook.

headline.print_headline: EU to Unveil Plan to Tax Turnover of Big U.S. Tech Firms
headline.main: EU to Unveil Plan to Tax Turnover of Big U.S. Tech Firms

docs.snippet: The first campaign video ad from the lone woman running for Maryland governor features her breastfeeding her infant daughter as she calls for more women in state leadership.

headline.print_headline: Lone Woman in Maryland Governor's Race Breastfeeds in Web Ad
headline.main: Lone Woman in Maryland Governor's Race Breastfeeds in Web Ad

docs.snippet: Austria's foreign minister has ordered an attache at the country's embassy in Israel to return home after a newspaper reported that he posted a picture of himself in a T-shirt sold by a far-right group.

headline.print_headline: Austria Envoy Brought Home From Israel Over Far-Right Report
headline.main: Austria Envoy Brought Home From Israel Over Far-Right Report

docs.snippet: You're on the couch. It's been a long day. What can you watch?

headline.print_headline: Real Stories Fuel a 'Golden Age' of Documentaries
headline.main: Real Stories Fuel a 'Golden Age' of Documentaries
